task.title: Add an Address in Student Record

prereq.p: Ensure that you have an active account in MyPack portal and log into it before proceeding with the task

context.p: NC State University requires all students to maintain accurate addresses in the MyPack portal student information system
The following types of addresses can be added to a student record:

step.cmd: Select Addresses from the left-hand navigation menu
Select the Add Diploma Address button under the appropriate header
Select the Copy From button to copy an address already existing in the record or manually enter the new address

postreq.p: International students must visit the OIS office for information on updating the SEVIS foreign address
